replies.body: dunkey is the best right now
FROGGEN MUST PLAY ANIVIA IN THE WORLDS
Faker. He still does have the best skills as an individual. Its just SKT that is doing bad
Its the best 20 at worlds, not the best 20 in the world.
Hai! One of the most underrated players in NA, leads c9 with near unquestionable shot-calls, and does it all with 1 lung!
Definitely One of top 3 midlaners worldwide , I Hope and Pray C9 win worlds! They are all great players and even better as people.
Top 3 mid laners worldwide? So he's up there with faker, froggen, dade, pawn, and cool? I don't think he's anywhere near even the top 10.
Rekkles needs to be near the top, srsly, best ADC LCS period.
Rekkles and Froggen, top 2 without a doubt
Many will say Forgiven is, other will point out Tabzz.
I'm fairly sure Forg1ven wasn't in the LCS this split...
if this top20 is serious, it should be 15 korean player and 5 chinese player

So let me get this straight: Out of the 18 koreans qualified for worlds, 15 are better than the single best western player? Sorry, that's just a misrepresentation of the regions and their strengths. Korean and chinese teams aren't that far ahead in terms of individual skill, they're better because their average level is higher and their teamwork is stronger.

While i agree that few or no western players belong near the top of the list, there are a few that certainly belong in the top 20.

They have the "Fear" Advantage on there side, Last year even Royal Club and OMG had fear of SKT, when we see the Champions League this season, we see nobody afraid at all of SKT in Korea, Team Work beats the need for Individual skills, SKT had no Team Work this year, Faker (and any player) will not always carry a team forever alone, Froggen may be godlike, And Rekkles but we do notice that there team mates sacrifice themselves for them to shine as much as they do, with or without talent, the team is needed. and some people do not see that obvious factor. This is why SKT, and CLG are not at the worlds :p
1. Pawn or Dade maybe or imp

While Bjergsen is a great player , I don't think he deserves to be in the top 20. Take Froggen for instance. He is better than Bjergsen (if you don't believe me check out the games he played against him) , his leadership is far better , he is the far most important player in Alliance , he has won almost every lane matchup in competitive games and he is just overall a great player. I think if bjergsen improves his shotcalling and leadership then he can get a spot in top 20.
i think bjergsen should be in the top 20 he may have lost to froggen but he should at least deserve some credit for defeating cloud 9
I think you were confusing Bjergsen with Dyrus just then.
xiaoweixiao better then gogoing? imp as #15? lmao.. whos the best adc? reckless? noob americans
Imp 15th?Rekkles considered better?What kind of a sick joke is this?
